prompts: Create a small, yellow Pokemon that scuttles quickly and hides in sandy environments.
Imagine a cute ground-type Pokemon with a round body and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in deserts, with sharp claws and a smooth back.
Generate a creature with a sandy color palette, designed for burrowing underground.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small, adorable armadillo with bright yellow features.
Design a tiny Pokemon known for its ability to blend into sandy terrains effortlessly.
Give me a Pokemon that is both sturdy and nimble, perfect for desert adventures.
